Question: McEnroe and Borg were battling for the top spot in those years, while this person played the role of the spoiler.
Hints: This person won three year-end championship titles, including two WCT Finals and one Masters Grand Prix.
Of the 31 major semifinals this person contested, he managed to win 15 of them and progress to the final.
Orantes upset this person in the final of the 1975 US Open, but this person is 11–3 overall against Orantes in tour events.
